tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE marine_life (
  marine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  area_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (area_id) REFERENCES marine_protected_areas(area_id)
);

CREATE TABLE marine_research (
  research_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
  research_topic VARCHAR(255),
  area_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (area_id) REFERENCES marine_protected_areas(area_id)
);

CREATE TABLE marine_activities (
  activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  activity_name VARCHAR(255),
  activity_description TEXT,
  area_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (area_id) REFERENCES marine_protected_areas(area_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MarineAreas (
    area_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    area_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    size FLOAT,
    regulations TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE MarineAnimals (
    animal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    animal_name VARCHAR(50),
    species VARCHAR(50),
    habitat VARCHAR(100),
    area_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (area_id) REFERENCES MarineAreas(area_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MarineVisitors (
    visitor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    visitor_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender CHAR(1),
    visit_date DATE,
    area_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (area_id) REFERENCES MarineAreas(area_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MarineEvents (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(50),
    event_date DATE,
    area_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (area_id) REFERENCES MarineAreas(area_id)
);
